project_descr: Conservation de la  biodiversité et gestion durable des ressources naturelles dans les zones arides en Algérie

outputs.output_descr:
The objective of this project is to rest(support) the Algerian government, by experimental actions(shares), in the stake in participative defense of the natural areas of three zones: Mergueb (Me sila), Oglat Daira ( Naâma) and Taghit ( Béchar).



Threatened by the degradation of lands and the disappearance of certain sorts(species), these zones are classified as persons who has right of way for the preservation of the ecosystem of the dry semi and dry zones of Algeria.



This project also suggests establishing(constituting) a control lever in the launch of the process of decentralization of the decisions, the management and the adoption of intersector-based dialogue for the long-lasting(sustainable) use of natural resources.

project_title: renforcement des capacités des ongs pour la biodiversité
